newsitem.title: INDIA: Indian metals prices mixed, weak overseas trends.
newsitem.headline: Indian metals prices mixed, weak overseas trends.

text.p: Indian metal prices were mixed on Friday as overseas markets also showed signs of weakening, dealers said.
Ready tin fell by 200 rupees at 34,300 rupees on increased arrivals of the imported make coupled with sluggish industrial buying. Tin was down by 200 rupees on Thursday.
"Reports of a weak trend in the world market also dragged down local prices," one broker said.
Copper was steady at 12,300 rupees, zinc at 6,450 rupees and lead at 4,450 rupees. Volumes were dull. Nickel was steady at 36,800 rupees and aluminium at 7,300 rupees.
